entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:29 PM ADT Wednesday 3 May 2023
